attributes.title: 2019 Isuzu D-Max 250 HO Hi-Rider Double-Cab

attributes.description: A perfect starter vehicle, student vehicle, or a daily commuter, the Peugeot 108 has enough comfort features as well as impressive economy to tick all those boxes. Equipped with; multifunction steering; multimedia infotainment with android auto and apple car play. Bluetooth and usb. height adjustable steering and height adjustable driver seats. Safety features: ABS braking; EBD; ESP and an impressive 6 airbag setup. High level rear brake light making this vehicle visible in the misty inclement weather conditions. 4 star euro ncap safety rating. Balance of the 5 year/ 100 000kms warranty and 3 year/ 45 000kms service plan. Boasting a 4.3litres/ 100kms makes the 108 a strong contender in our markets high fuel price.

attributes.description:
VW MASTERCAR DEALER : 80 Point Mechanical Check. AA Roadworthy Tested and accident free. We accept trade-ins. We arrange finance. We offer value added products / Service and Warranty / Plan extensions. We deliver Nationwide. Price advertised excludes: Dealer Service Fee of R3990, Lic /Reg of R850 , Numberplates of R350, Delivery fee (price dependent on distance) and optional value added products. All sales subject to balance of Factory warranty or warranty purchase.
RECONDITIONING PROCESS COMPLETED: * NB Please note that no further Recon will be done on this vehicle. *Tyre thred AA  Dekra Approved,* Touch up of chipmarks, *Polishing of small scratches, *Respray ONLY, when a panel has excessive damage (deep scratches,chipmarks and dents) *Filling of windscreen chips,*Repair of cosmetic compoments when needed.
